about_the_game:
WELL...HERE YOU ARE...

You wake up to silence.

Something is here. You can’t see it, but you can feel it. It watches. It waits. And it hunts.

The base, once a haven on the moon's surface, is now a labyrinth of flickering lights, groaning metal, and half-seen horrors.

Every corridor is a gamble, every corner hides the unknown. Your only tools are your instincts and what little you can scavenge along the way.

Can you outwit the unseen predator? Can you escape the decaying moonbase before it collapses completely? Or will you be another silent victim of the creature lurking in the shadows?

WHAT TO EXPECT:

  • Dynamic Survival Horror: Every playthrough is different with a procedurally generated maze that keeps you on edge. No run is the same.

  • Classic Atmosphere: 3D visuals with a retro-inspired dithering effect immerse you in a chilling, timeless aesthetic.

  • First-Person Tension: Limited visibility and environmental storytelling put you in the center of the fear. Every sound, every flicker of light, becomes a potential threat.

  • Test Your Nerves: It’s not just about finding your way out—it’s about staying alive long enough to escape.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 - 64bit
  • Processor: Intel / AMD - 2.0 GHz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA / AMD Discrete GPU
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

reviews:
“As I crouched in a corner, my heart beating so loud that it was a miracle the monster wasn’t tracking me from that alone, I couldn’t help but think, “God, this rules.””
TheGamer

“Even with such simple graphics, I felt utterly horrified in a way most games couldn’t even come close to making me feel.”
GamingTrend

“本作雖然是充滿未來感的背景設定，但以復古的像素風格呈現，反而有種早期太空恐怖片的感覺。玩家將以第一人稱視角探索基地內部，在有限的視角中，風吹草動都能帶來壓迫感”
4Gamer Taiwan
short_description: The base is silent—abandoned. The air feels heavy, and oxygen is running out. In the shadows, something stirs. You can hear it, but you can’t see it. Every step echoes in the darkness, every sound makes your pulse race. Survive. Escape. Before time runs out.
supported_languages: English, Korean, Japanese, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese
